text.name: ANIMAL_HELPER_START_HOUR_TOOLTIP
text.text: The helpers will run at this time. Note: The helpers won't run when you are resting

text.name: ANIMAL_HELPER_FILL_STRAW_TEXT
text.text: Fill straw in pastures and stables

text.name: ANIMAL_HELPER_FILL_STRAW_TOOLTIP
text.text: Determines if the helpers will topup straw in pastures and stables

text.name: ANIMAL_HELPER_IS_DEBUG_TOOLTIP
text.text: When ON, this mod will print more messages and the Helper will run every Hour
